title: How to Make Fusilli with Garlic and Bell Peppers

steps.headline: Boil the pasta as per package instructions.
Cut the green,yellow and red bell peppers into small squares.
Chop garlic and put to the side.
Pour 1 tablespoon olive oil in a pan and place on gas burner.
After the oil is warm, put in the chopped garlic.
After 1-2 seconds, put 1/2 teaspoon chilli flakes.
When a nice aroma comes, put in the previously chopped bell peppers and sauté for 1-2 minutes.
Pour 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce and toss the pasta.
Throw in some chopped sweet basil leaves,cover the pan and turn off the gas
And your dish is ready to be served.

text: Boil the pasta as per package instructions.  Cut the green,yellow and red bell peppers into small squares.  Chop garlic and put to the side.  Pour 1 tablespoon olive oil in a pan and place on gas burner.  After the oil is warm, put in the chopped garlic.  After 1-2 seconds, put 1/2 teaspoon chilli flakes.  When a nice aroma comes, put in the previously chopped bell peppers and sauté for 1-2 minutes.  Add the boiled pasta.  Season with salt and pepper.  Pour 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce and toss the pasta.  Throw in some chopped sweet basil leaves,cover the pan and turn off the gas  Let it stand for 1-2 minutes.  And your dish is ready to be served.
